personality.backstory: Has lived in this village for over sixty years, remembering times when the forests were safe and villages prospered. Lost her family to a raid years ago, now considers all villagers her children.
personality.motivation: To protect her village and pass on the wisdom of the old ways before she's gone.
quirks: Calls everyone 'child' regardless of their age
Always mentions the weather in conversation
Pauses to remember names, sometimes getting them wrong

hidden_agenda.short_term_goal: Find a worthy successor to carry on the village traditions
hidden_agenda.long_term_goal: Ensure the location of the ancient temple beneath the mountain is passed to someone trustworthy
hidden_agenda.secret: Knows the location of a hidden vault containing relics from when her ancestors first settled here
reveal_conditions: After player helps defend the village or its people
When player mentions ancient ruins or lost treasures

speech_style.sentence_length: moderate, sometimes trailing off in thought
